title: cottontail teemo chroma not on sale for IP?
body:
Hey quick question
was the chroma ip sale not starting today?  I see some of them are on sale for ip but not others

does it rotate which ones you can buy for ip during the sale or did i miss something?

replies.body: the missing skins are now available for ip - it was a bug and its fixed now!

Cottontail Teemo chromas are slated to go on sale, but the Chroma Sale isn't live yet.  Hang on for a few more hours (11 pacific), when it activates on the store.  Let me know if that clears things up!

i safed ip specifically for cotton tail teemo, now he is not on sale, although it was cleared said he would be in this post of riot:
http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/chroma-ip-sales-32217-4517

{{item:3070}}

EDIT: seems like they messed up the post, since every skin where it says that it will not be on sale for RP is actually not on sale for either IP or RP.
